name: Hold The Line !
description:
Hold the line is a fast paced endless runner ...

First time your finger is the main character!

It’s so easy to play...

You just have to hold your finger on the screen and try to stay hold the line as long as possible...

- Generated maze, each time different.
- Travelled with world famous monuments heights.
- Compare your score with friends on the game center leaderboard


If you support our product, you can pay to buy the paid version with full function and no advertisements. Your support is the motivation of our survival and continuous development.
We can therefore continue to go along this way and will do better.
